snippet: The Rangers can clinch the Eastern Conference title and the top playoff seed Sunday with a Pittsburgh loss to Philadelphia and a win against the visiting Bruins.
abstract: New York Rangers could clinch the Eastern Conference regular-season title and the top playoff seed, but coach John Tortorella says winning in the playoffs is what matters.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers can clinch the Eastern Conference title and the top playoff seed Sunday with a Pittsburgh loss to Philadelphia and a win against the visiting Bruins.

headline.seo: Regular-Season Supremacy Not Enough for Rangers
headline.main: Regular-Season Supremacy Not Enough for Rangers
headline.print_headline: Regular-Season Supremacy Not Enough for Rangers
